name: AfterTech (Spriteless Demo)
description:
AfterTech is a cyberpunk visual novel set in the near future. Inspired by Narutaru, Digimon, and Serial Experiments Lain.

This short demo includes chapter one, and no artwork or character sprites.

Epilepsy Warning:

This game contains scenes with flashing lights.

This is the story of Jonas, a professional hacker who stumbles upon one of The Wired's greatest mysteries: a digital egg. An egg that exists within the nexus between virtual connections. When the egg suddenly hatches, Jonas is caught in the crossfire of a battle raging between Virtual Beasts, and the humans that have bonded with them.

This project is currently looking for an artist. Please contact me on Twitter or Discord if you're interested in working with me! (Unpaid, sorry.) (I don't have any money)

All donations will go to further developing the game!

Interested in what I do? Feel free to follow me here!
